for query UPDATE wp_ha_resourcemanager_bookings AS t JOIN ( SELECT resource_id, `from`, LOWER(CONCAT( SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 1, 8), '-', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 9, 4), '-', '4', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 14, 3), '-', 'a', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 17, 3), '-', SUBSTR(MD5(CONCAT(u.resource_id, '_', u.`from`)), 21, 12) )) AS uuid FROM wp_ha_resourcemanager_bookings AS u GROUP BY resource_id, `from` ) AS u ON t.resource_id = u.resource_id AND t.`from` = u.`from` SET t.uid = u.uuid WHERE t.uid = '' made by require_once('wp-load.php'), require_once('wp-config.php'), require_once('wp-settings.php'), do_action('init'), WP_Hook->do_action, WP_Hook->apply_filters, ha\resourcemanager\DB->create_db, ha\resourcemanager\DB->migrate_2_8_to_3_1, WP_SQLite_DB->query, WP_SQLite_DB->print_error
